judge_a_verdict.reason: All required evidence files present; schemas validate; workflow checks and report/verdict statuses are PASS.

details.claude_md_semantic: CLAUDE.md contains all 3 required principles: Fail-Closed (Missing evidence => FAIL), No-Source-No-Norm (Changes must cite registry), Two-Plane (GitHub=verification, Codespaces=execution)
details.evidence_consistency: All 5 evidence files share task_id=tvs-20260128-001. Verdict status (PASS) is logically consistent with gate_report summary (PASS). Timestamps are monotonically ordered: input_manifest < run_manifest = settings_evidence < gate_report < verdict
details.drift_detection: No drift markers found in any .md files outside evidence/. Scanned for: PLATFORMIZE, CENTER_OF_EXCELLENCE, UNIFIED_PLATFORM, NEW_GATE_CLASS, HEAVY_DASHBOARD, and soft-language markers
details.phase0_config: Phase 0 dimensionality reduction correctly implemented: vibe.enabled=true, dev.enabled=true, spec.enabled=false, ops.enabled=false
details.gatekit_semantic: gatekit.yaml version=0.3.0, required_checks=[docops-gatekit/finalize], gates_count=4. Required check name matches workflow job name
details.e2e_logic_chain: PR #1 state=MERGED, mergeCommit=8e345d9, mergedAt=2026-01-28T13:27:12Z. Full chain: Evidence Pack -> GateKit PASS -> PR -> merge_group PASS -> Merge confirmed

judge_b_verdict.reason: All 6 semantic checks passed. Evidence pack is internally consistent (task_id, timestamps, verdict-gate logic). No drift markers detected. Phase 0 profile configuration is correct. Registry semantics align with workflow. End-to-end logic chain from evidence to merge is complete and verified.

final_aggregate_verdict.action: ้ฒๅฅ Merge Queue โ

D_workflow.docops-gatekit.yml:
name: docops-gatekit

on:
  pull_request:
  merge_group:

permissions:
  contents: read

jobs:
  finalize:
    name: docops-gatekit/finalize
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@a5ac7e51b41094c92402da3b24376905380afc29

      - name: Setup Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@f677139bbe7f9c59b41e40162b753c062f5d49a3
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install deps
        run: pip install jsonschema pyyaml

      - name: Detect TASK_ID
        id: tid
        run: |
          TID="$(ls -1 docops/evidence | grep -v '^\.' | sort | tail -n 1)"
          echo "TASK_ID=$TID" >> $GITHUB_ENV
          echo "Detected: $TID"

      - name: Run GateKit
        run: python docops/scripts/run_gatekit.py "$TASK_ID"

      - name: TVS Verify
        run: ./docops/scripts/tvs_verify.sh "$TASK_ID"

      - name: Upload Evidence
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@b4b15b8c7c6ac21ea08fcf65892d2ee8f75cf882
        with:
          name: evidence-${{ env.TASK_ID }}
          path: docops/evidence/${{ env.TASK_ID }}
